group_1.textRight: I can't fight alongside you the way you @are right now.

group_1.textLeft: Chi-zu-ru...Chi-zu-ru... Why are you doing this.
You're the one who said...we should @work together.

group_1.textRight: She’s been going over this ever since @she came home...
What exactly is it for?

group_1.textLeft: I have no idea. It's making me even more curious.

group_1.textRight: It’s a historical drama based on Mizuna folklore.
It sort of feels like a fairytale!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Woah! Since when did you show up?!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* I needed a break!
Since you guys are all curious...@Let me tell you the story!

group_1.narration: "Long ago, there was a time when everyone was @suffering from a famine brought on by a drought. @Things were made worse by a lord who collected @a heavy tax, and spent it all on personal luxuries."
“Meanwhile...there were two girls in @Kamihama named Tsuyu and Chizuru who @were both skilled in martial arts.”
“Their families detested each other, @and their personalities were polar opposites."
“But after they met, Tsuyu and Chizuru @came to know each other's feelings, @and grew to trust one another.”
“In public, however, they couldn’t get along @because of their families,”
"The tragic suffering everyone was going @through broke their hearts."
"The cautious Tsuyu wanted to help people, @but she knew she couldn’t do anything on her own. @Their families refused to along, and it was difficult @for her and Chizuru to reach out to each other.”
"But the bold Chizuru was convinced she and Tsuyu @could overcome the problems around them, @and that the two of them could work @together to punish the sinister lord.”
"She believed their teamwork would @be enough to save everyone!”
"They both share the same goal, @but have different mindsets, @and they have their disagreements…”
"But Tsuyu's pet magpie serves @as the bridge between them."
"And then...once Tsuyu and Chizuru join forces, @the starving people begin to rise up, @and successfully punish the lord!"

group_1.textRight: It's a story with a happy ending where everyone @is freed from hunger!
From what I hear, the show is targeted @at kids your age.
I think you'll all really like it.

group_1.textLeft: Are there gonna be any fight scenes innit?

group_1.textRight: Absolutely!
At one point, Tsuyu and Chizuru will turn their @backs on each other.
A lot happens, and ultimately, they'll @patch things up...
...but not before they have a scene where they @convey their feelings through a swordfight!

group_1.textLeft: Yoooooooo! Now I’m all charged up for this too!
But why will this be performed for the Tanabata Festival?

group_1.textRight: According to legend...
The day that Tsuyu and Chizuru teamed up @to punish the lord...
Just so happened to line up perfectly @with Tanabata.
From then on, people began entrusting their @wishes to Tsuyu and Chizuru.
It became known as "The Legendary Story of @the Paper Mulberry Leaf."
Before people used strips of paper, those leaves @were used to write wishes upon.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I see...so that’s what it refers to.

group_1.textRight: Tsuyu and Chizuru's outfits also look like clothes @you'd wear for Tanabata!

group_1.textLeft: Like robes that a seamstress would make? @I'm sure they must be beautiful.

group_1.textRight: They sure are! Look forward to it!
